HTMLFormElement.method

The HTMLFormElement.method represents the HTTP method used to submit the form.

Syntax

string = form.method
form.method = string

Example

document.forms["myform"].method = "post";

Specification

HTML 5, Section 4.10.19.6, Form submission

DOM Level 2 HTML: method
